🥗 EXTREMELY OBESE – BEGINNER DIET PLAN (Low-calorie, high-fiber, low-sugar, anti-inflammatory) 🕗 Morning (6:30–7:30 AM) 1 glass lukewarm water with lemon
5 soaked almonds or 2 walnuts (avoid if allergic)
(Optional) Add 1 teaspoon chia seeds to water (soaked overnight)
🍳 Breakfast (8:00–9:00 AM) Choose one:
1 bowl vegetable oats or dalia (no oil)
1 slice brown bread + 2 boiled eggs (or paneer if vegetarian)
Smoothie: Spinach + cucumber + green apple + water + chia seeds
✅ Avoid tea/coffee with sugar
🕒 Mid-Morning (11:00 AM) 1 fruit: apple, guava, papaya, or watermelon
OR cucumber/carrot slices
🍽️ Lunch (1:00–2:00 PM) 1–2 small whole wheat rotis or 1 small bowl brown rice
1 bowl dal or lean chicken
1 bowl steamed mixed vegetables
Salad: tomato, cucumber, beetroot
🕔 Evening Snack (4:30–5:30 PM) Green tea (no sugar)
Handful of roasted chana, fox nuts, or 1 boiled egg
🌙 Dinner (7:00–8:00 PM) Vegetable soup + paneer/tofu/chicken
OR 1 small roti + veggies
OR grilled vegetables with hummus
✅ Avoid rice at dinner ✅ Try to eat dinner 2–3 hours before sleeping
🌃 Before Bed (Optional) 1 cup warm water + 1 pinch turmeric
Avoid milk if trying to reduce calories faster

🚶‍♂️ EXERCISE ROUTINE FOR EXTREMELY OBESE (Beginner and Safe) 🔰 WEEK 1–2: FOUNDATION PHASE Duration: 15–20 minutes per day
✅ Low-Impact Movements (Daily) Seated march in place – 1 minute
Seated arm raises – 2 sets of 10
Wall push-ups – 2 sets of 5
Seated leg lifts – 2 sets of 10
Gentle neck/shoulder stretches
🧘 Breathing and Relaxation Deep breathing (Anulom-Vilom, 5 mins)
Guided meditation (YouTube apps like Headspace or Calm)
⏩ WEEK 3–4: CARDIO + STRENGTH COMBO Walking indoors/outdoors: 20–30 minutes daily (slow pace, take breaks)
Chair squats (assisted): 2 sets of 5–8 reps
Step-ups on low platform (if safe): 1 set of 10 reps
Light resistance band workouts (arms, legs)
✅ WEEK 5+: INCREASE INTENSITY SLIGHTLY Alternate days:
Cardio (walking, slow stationary cycling)
Strength (resistance bands, bodyweight support)
✅ Add water workouts if access to a pool – it reduces joint pressure.
